name: A Way Out - Space Smash
description:
… Connection Failure …

   Then how are we here?
       Where exactly is here?
          Who are these people?
             Why are they so damn smug?

There must be an exit. We just need to find enough fuel to find it, right? We're beyond caring how we got here—what we're doing here. It's time to escape. We'll smash our way out if we must!

W
A S D Pilot forward or back, and rotate left and right.

[NUMPAD 8] to ascend
[NUMPAD 2] to descend

Watch your fuel! Grab power charges whenever you find them.

And...

Smash the hell out of those smug stained glass windows!

This game was made as part of the:

LM0B Beginners Game Jam #24

Some sound effects (breaking glass, power-ups) came from Freesound.Org, and were layered and edited by the creator to work in the game.

The game theme song:
"Attack of the Flaming Pie Tins" by Eric Matyas soundimage.org

Voices, models, code, artwork all created by the creator.

Software used to create this game: Unity 3D, Blender 3D, Gimp, Audacity
